name: Opera Partially Downloaded File
summary: Learn about .OPDOWNLOAD files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: The .opdownload extension indicates that the download is incomplete. The extension is removed once the download is complete, and the file is then ready to be used.

If the file downloading from the Opera web browser is interrupted before it is finished, you may be able to still recover a portion of the file by deleting the ".opdownload" extension and trying to open it with a program that supports the file being downloaded.
NOTE: OPDOWNLOAD files are similar to .CRDOWNLOAD files used by Google Chrome and to .DOWNLOAD files, which are used by Apple Safari.

instructions: An OPDOWNLOAD file is usually an incomplete download file created by the Opera web browser. When you download a file in Opera, it creates an OPDOWNLOAD file and once the download is complete, it renames the file to its original format. Therefore, it is not possible to convert an OPDOWNLOAD file to MP4 or ZIP, as it is not a valid file format. You need to wait until the download is complete and the file is renamed to its original format before you can convert it to MP4 or ZIP. If you are unable to complete the download or the file is corrupt, you may need to restart the download or try downloading the file from a different source.
